Reference

All functions

CD()

Get mooring/element drag coefficient

RMS()

Compute root-mean-square

anchor()

Create an anchor object

anchorWeight()

Find Anchor Weight of a Mooring

angle()

Angle of mooring elements

app1()

Run a GUI app for interactive simulations

app2()

Run a two-element GUI app for interactive simulations

app2bs()

Run a two-element GUI app for interactive simulations

area()

Side-view Area of Mooring Element

buoyancy()

Buoyancy of mooring elements

buoyancyCalculation()

Compute buoyancy of object given in-air properties

chain()

Create a chain object

clamped()

Clamp an Instrument on a Wire

connector()

Create a connector object

depth()

Depth of mooring elements

drag()

Drag on mooring elements

findElement()

Fuzzy search for mooring elements

float()

Create a float object

height()

Get mooring/element height

instrument()

Create an instrument object

is.anchor()

Determine which Mooring Elements are Anchors

is.chain()

Determine which Mooring Elements are Chains

is.connector()

Determine which Mooring Elements are Connectors

is.float()

Determine which Mooring Elements are Floats

is.instrument()

Determine which Mooring Elements are Instruments

is.misc()

Determine which Mooring Elements are Misc

is.mooring()

Determine Whether an Object is a Mooring

is.mooringElement()

Determine Whether an Object is a Mooring Element

is.release()

Determine which Mooring Elements are Release

is.wire()

Determine which Mooring Elements are Wires

knockdown()

Compute mooring knockdown by a horizontal current

misc()

Create a misc object

mooring()

Create a mooring

mooringDebug()

Print a debugging message

mooringElements

Dataset of wire, chain, and float properties

plot

Draw a mooring diagram

release()

Create a mooring-release object

segmentize()

Decompose chain and wire portions into shorter segments

summary

Summarize a mooring or a mooringElement

summaryMooring()

Summarize a mooring

tension()

Tension between mooring elements

wire()

Create a wire object

x()

Horizontal coordinate of mooring elements

z()

Vertical coordinate of mooring elements
